full_summary:
# Fort Wellington NHS - Eastern Palisade Rehabilitation, Fort Wellington National Historic Site

## Tender Information
* **Title**: Fort Wellington NHS - Eastern Palisade Rehabilitation, Fort Wellington National Historic Site
* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01008805
* **Amendment Number**: 5
* **Solicitation Number**: 5P468-22-0149/A

## Description
The Department of Parks Canada is issuing a tender for the Eastern Palisade Rehabilitation project located within the Fort Wellington National Historic Site. The project includes the replacement of the eastern portion of the double palisade (approx. 115m), tie-in to newly constructed single palisade, and site restoration. The estimated value of the project is between $500,001 and $1,000,000, inclusive of taxes.

## Bid Submission
Bidders must submit their bids via fax or email to the specified contact information. Bids received in-person or by courier will not be accepted. The only acceptable email address for responses to the bid solicitation is soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca. Bidders must be aware that emails with links to bid documents will not be accepted, and bid documents must be sent as email attachments.

## Project Timeline
The project is expected to be completed by October 31, 2023. Bidders must submit their proposals in accordance with the project timeline. Any clarifications or changes to the bid solicitation resulting from a site visit will be included in an amendment to the bid solicitation.

## Tender Documents
Bid documents are available through the Government of Canada's tendering service at www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders. Addenda, when issued, will be available from the Government of Canada tendering service. Bidders must obtain documents from the official government source to avoid any risks associated with bidding on incomplete or outdated information.

## Contact Information
For any inquiries or concerns, please contact Christine Piche at Christine.Piche@pc.gc.ca or 873-355-8841.
